context_right: ThreatLabZ team has been actively tracking these IoT attacks and analyzing their behavior, exploits, and payloads.

sentence_left: In some cases, we also saw cryptominers as the final payload delivered in the IoT campaigns.

sentence_left: On December 11, 2018, a remote code execution vulnerability in the ThinkPHP framework was reported.
sentence_right: We believe ThinkPHP is also being incorporated in upcoming IoT devices for its management plugins.
label: Greater China is an informal geographical area that shares commercial and cultural ties with the Han Chinese people, The notion of "Greater China" refers to the area that usually encompasses Mainland China, Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan in East Asia, places where the majority are culturally and ethnically Han Chinese. Some analysts may also include places which have predominantly ethnic Chinese population such as Singapore. The term can be generalised to encompass "linkages among regional Chinese communities".
